page.title: 19MY DAY
page.content: Today is Monday.I got ready for school and had my breakfast.For the last few minutes I turned the T.V. on and watched T.V.a.m.I saw the weather report.It said fine for the rest of the day.When I got to school everybody was talking about the motorway.When the whistle was blown everybody lined up.We went in class and did maths.When playtime came we had to stay in because it was raining.After play we did English.When 3.30 came we all went home. My friend Shelley came to call for me and we went down the playing fields. When I came in I spent most of the evening watching T.V.
